title: Nordstrom’s Anniversary Sale Is Full Of Versatile Dresses: 26 To Shop Now
description: We’re fully embracing summer… and all the seasonal deals (from Lululemon’s Summer Scores event to Damson Madder’s summer sale and even Old Navy’s discounted occasion wear line), so of course we’re jumping on Nordstrom’s Anniversary Sale. The reader-favorite retailer’s annual sale continues through August 3 and features covetable styles at major discounts.Now’s your chance to review Refinery29 editors’ picks and add your favorites to your cart ASAP (the best pieces don’t stay in stock for long). To help you focus on truly killer summer fashion finds, we've curated the best summer dresses from Nordstrom’s sale section.This year, Nordstrom's dress sale has you covered for every occasion — from casual days and vacations to work and beach weddings — with styles as low as $34. Expect wedding-ready looks, shirt-dresses, sweet milkmaid silhouettes, and versatile summer-to-fall options that do the most (in a good way).Alongside Nordstrom’s own brands like Caslon and Open Edit, you’ll find other favorites like Free People, Paige, Sam Edelman, and Frame in the mix. Dive in and refresh your summer wardrobe with these can’t-miss deals from the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale, while it lasts.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. html:
We’re fully embracing summer… and all the seasonal deals (from Lululemon’s Summer Scores event to Damson Madder’s summer sale and even Old Navy’s discounted occasion wear line), so of course we’re jumping on Nordstrom’s Anniversary Sale. The reader-favorite retailer’s annual sale continues through August 3 and features covetable styles at major discounts.

Now’s your chance to review Refinery29 editors’ picks and add your favorites to your cart ASAP (the best pieces don’t stay in stock for long). To help you focus on truly killer summer fashion finds, we've curated the best summer dresses from Nordstrom’s sale section.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

This year, Nordstrom's dress sale has you covered for every occasion — from casual days and vacations to work and beach weddings — with styles as low as $34. Expect wedding-ready looks, shirt-dresses, sweet milkmaid silhouettes, and versatile summer-to-fall options that do the most (in a good way).

Alongside Nordstrom’s own brands like Caslon and Open Edit, you’ll find other favorites like Free People, Paige, Sam Edelman, and Frame in the mix. Dive in and refresh your summer wardrobe with these can’t-miss deals from the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale, while it lasts.

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.
